Package client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
client.ClientController
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
This class manages the logic for the Client and controls the data flow.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Carolin Nordstrom, Oscar Kareld, Chanon Borgstrom, Sofia Hallberg.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientController()
    Constructs a MainFrame and a ClientCommunicationController object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createUser​(java.lang.String userName)
    Receives a String and creates a new User object and calls the logIn method.
    void logIn()
    Sets the UserType to LOGIN and sends the user object to ClientCommunicationController.
    void logOut()
    Sets the UserType to LOGOUT and sends the user object to ClientCommunicationController.
    void receiveNotificationFromCCC​(Activity activity)
    Receives an Activity object an sends it forth to MainFrame.
    void receiveUser​(User user)
    Replaces the temporary user object with the already existing object from the server.
    void sendActivityToCCC​(Activity activity)
    Receives an Activity Object and sends it forth to the ClientCommunicationController.
    void setInterval​(int interval)
    Sets a users interval and the UserType to SENDINTERVAL and sends it to ClientCommunicationController.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientController

      public ClientController()
      Constructs a MainFrame and a ClientCommunicationController object. Then calls the method createUser.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public void createUser​(java.lang.String userName)
      Receives a String and creates a new User object and calls the logIn method.
      Parameters:
      userName -

    • sendActivityToCCC

      public void sendActivityToCCC​(Activity activity)
      Receives an Activity Object and sends it forth to the ClientCommunicationController.
      Parameters:
      activity - the received object.

    • logIn

      public void logIn()
      Sets the UserType to LOGIN and sends the user object to ClientCommunicationController.

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Sets the UserType to LOGOUT and sends the user object to ClientCommunicationController.

    • receiveNotificationFromCCC

      public void receiveNotificationFromCCC​(Activity activity)
      Receives an Activity object an sends it forth to MainFrame.
      Parameters:
      activity - the received object.

    • receiveUser

      public void receiveUser​(User user)
      Replaces the temporary user object with the already existing object from the server. If it's a new user, a welcome message is sent.
      Parameters:
      user - the received object.

    • setInterval

      public void setInterval​(int interval)
      Sets a users interval and the UserType to SENDINTERVAL and sends it to ClientCommunicationController.
      Parameters:
      interval - the notification interval.
